actions.committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 102 North Main Street in Cedarville, Ohio, as the "William 'Brent' Turner Post Office".

summary.text: Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 102 North Main Street in Cedarville, Ohio, as the "William 'Brent" Turner Post Office'.

titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 102 North Main Street in Cedarville, Ohio, as the "William 'Brent' Turner Post Office".
